item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by John C. Maxwell
item.description: "People don't care how much you know until they know how much you care" -- John C. Maxwell

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Alfred Adler
item.description: "Trust only movement. Life happens at the level of events, not of words. Trust movement." -- Alfred Adler

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by John C. Maxwell
item.description: "Change is inevitable. Growth is optional." -- John C. Maxwell

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Eduardo Galeano
item.description: "Each person shines with his or her own light. No two flames are alike. There are big flames and little flames, flames of every color. Some people’s flames are so still they don’t even flicker in the wind, while others have wild flames that fill the air with sparks. Some foolish flames neither burn nor shed light, but others blaze with life so fiercely that you can’t look at them without blinking, and if you approach you shine in the fire." -- Eduardo Galeano

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Eduardo Galeano
item.description: "Utopia lies at the horizon. When I draw nearer by two steps, it retreats two steps. If I proceed ten steps forward, it swiftly slips ten steps ahead. No matter how far I go, I can never reach it. What, then, is the purpose of utopia? It is to cause us to advance." -- Eduardo Galeano

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Eduardo Galeano
item.description: "I don't believe in charity. I believe in solidarity. Charity is so vertical. It goes from the top to the bottom. Solidarity is horizontal. It respects the other person. I have a lot to learn from other people." -- Eduardo Galeano

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "We must be free not because we claim freedom, but because we practice it." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Given the choice between the experience of pain and nothing, I would choose pain." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "...I give you the mausoleum of all hope and desire...I give it to you not that you may remember time, but that you might forget it now and then for a moment and not spend all of your breath trying to conquer it. Because no battle is ever won he said. They are not even fought. The field only reveals to man his own folly and despair, and victory is an illusion of philosophers and fools." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "I am fundamentally an optimist. Whether that comes from nature or nurture, I cannot say. Part of being optimistic is keeping one's head pointed toward the sun, one's feet moving forward. There were many dark moments when my faith in humanity was sorely tested, but I would not and could not give myself up to despair. That way lays defeat and death." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "It always seems impossible until it's done." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "Do not judge me by my successes, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "When a man is denied the right to live the life he believes in, he has no choice but to become an outlaw." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Shahrooz add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description:
"I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
(Popular misquote of "You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.")" -- Maya Angelou
